title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1261.2 - Accessibility and availability of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1261.2 - Accessibility and availability of records

State Regulations

Such records shall: (a) be located in a readily accessible
location; (b) be made available to
the local code enforcement official upon request; and
(c) include, but not necessarily be limited
to, the following information: (1)
address of
the building; (2)
name of owner or
operator; (3)
apartment or unit
number; (4)
name of
tenant; (5)
location of each
installation; (6)
date of
installation; (7)
whether detector
is battery-operated or line-connected; (8)
date initially tested for operable
condition; (9)
dates of subsequent
testing for operable condition; (10)
date of vacating of unit; and
(11)
date of tenant request for replacement
and/or repair of a detector. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1261.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
